channel.title: git on zhili
channel.description: Recent content in git on zhili

item.title: git 出现错误Could not resolve host: github.com
item.description: 1 2 3 ❯ git clone https://github.com/Zhili/GameServer Cloning into 'GameServer'... fatal: unable to access 'https://github.com/Zhili/GameServer/': Couldn't resolve host name (Just a little reminder) If you want the hostname also be resolved by the proxy (that means passing everything through the proxy), especially when you are cloning a gist, you can use the following setting (the key is that it uses socks5h instead of socks5): 1 git config --global http.
